qas.question: Whos is the late Mayor of Boston?
Who came up with the Renew Boston Whole Building Incentive?
The incentive reduced the cost of what in buildings?
The goal is to get how  many residents to sign up?
How much does the program cost?

context: Another initiative, presented by the late <a1_0>Mayor <a0_0>Thomas Menino<a1_0/><a0_0/>, is the Renew Boston Whole Building Incentive, which reduces the <a2_0>cost of living<a2_0/> in buildings that are deemed energy efficient. This, much like the green housing developments, gives people of low socioeconomic status an opportunity to find housing in communities that support the environment. The ultimate goal of this initiative is to enlist <a3_0>500<a3_0/> Bostonians to participate in a <a4_0>free<a4_0/>, in-home energy assessment.
